text: Inactivation of IBV was performed by exposing the virus stock to 120,000 mJ/cm 2 of 254-nm shortwave UV radiation for 15 min with a CL-1000 cross-linker (UVP) 47 . To demonstrate that IBV had been inactivated, the Vero cells were incubated with UV-IBV and the cell lysates were analyzed by Western blot to confirm that no viral proteins can be detected.
